app.name: Wii Fit Sync
app.short_description: Sync Wii Fit data to iOS
app.long_description:
Wii Fit Sync allows you to export your Wii Fit body measurement and exercise data to the Goals iOS app over your local network.
Features: - Exports weight, BMI, and balance measurements - Exports exercise/activity history (future) - Works with Wii Fit and Wii Fit Plus - Simple TCP-based sync protocol
Usage: 1. Launch this app from the Homebrew Channel 2. Note the IP address displayed 3. Open Goals app on iOS, go to Settings > Wii Fit 4. Enter the IP address and tap Test Connection 5. Sync your data!
Requirements: - Wii with Homebrew Channel installed - Wii Fit or Wii Fit Plus save data - WiFi connection on the same network as your iOS device
